Mustafa Aboharb
Healthcare Reporting, Data Transformation, Interface Developer
applelight@yahoo.com   |   201.220.6217   |   Auburn Hills MI
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
15+ years data transformation, reporting, and application development 
professional.  4+ years working with the Health Edge Health Rules Payor (HPR) 
Claims Payor Systems:  1.5+ years HRP implementation and 2+ years HRP 
operational development.
HRP Implementation

scope, and plan HRP interfacing and reporting requirements
    Worked with business stakeholders and allied vendors to solidify technical 
requirements for reporting and integrations
    Developed multiple interfaces, HRP to external systems, including Provider & 
Member web portals, Provider Credentialing, State of Michigan Medicaid 
Eligibility
    Developed SQL functions to “work-around” HRP peculiarities such as the 
Date Dimension table

Eligibility
